alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:51PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 651 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Port Everglades to Hallandale to Golden Glades. Movement was north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Hallandale, Miami Gardens, Lauderhill, North Miami, North Miami Beach, Oakland Park, Aventura, Lauderdale Lakes, Dania Beach, Cooper City, Sunny Isles Beach, Opa-Locka and West Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
